I agree and I think you're right!  The film track and music track are recorded separately during the creation of a music video .Ricky is singing PLAYBACK!

yes, it's supposed to be playback - but it's a real great song and a great video - it's rock and po music history ...
for me it was a great surprise, that Ricky Nelson had such a revival with the song "Garden Party" a decade after his greatest hits - this I didn't realize before this great documentation - thanks 2u Zlatko
